label-width.toolip: This defines the width of the button label

group-windows.tooltip:
If windows are grouped, all windows from an application are managed by the same button,
if not grouped, all windows get an own button

animation-time.tooltip: The flashing time when a new window is opened via a button

show-windows-for-current-monitor.description: Only show windows on the same monitor
show-windows-for-current-monitor.tooltip:
If enabled, this applet instance only manages windows
that are displayed on the same monitor

menu-show-on-click.tooltip:
If enabled, a popup menu with a list of current windows will show when clicking
(Only with 2 or more windows)

menu-show-on-hover.tooltip: If enabled, a popup menu with a list of current windows will show when hovering

show-previews.tooltip:
If enabled, the popup menu will show window previews
(Always disabled when running Cinnamon in Software Rendering Mode)

preview-timeout-show.tooltip:
The waiting time for the popup menu to show, when hovering a button
(Not used when moving directly to a different button in the list)

preview-timeout-hide.tooltip:
The waiting time for the popup menu to hide, when leaving a button
(Not used when moving directly to a different button in the list)
